Description: Fragment of rim and wall of Attic black-glazed pottery cup-skyphos; concave lip, sharply offset; wholly glazed black (flaked off on exterior).
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by Akademisches Kunstmuseum. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Compare Sparkes, Agora XII no. 572 pl. 25
Bibliographic references: Piekarski 2001 / Die Keramik aus Naukratis im Akademischen Kunstmuseum Bonn (p.49, no. D23, pl. 23.3)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1525)
